colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,CES TSUL KHRIMS YANG DAG PAR LDAN PA'I MDO'I TSIG DON CUNG ZAD BSHAD PA 'DI NI, SDOM BRTZON CHOS LA 'DUN PA'I DGE SLONG DON GRUB RGYA MTSOS YUN RING PO NAS YANG NAS YANG DU BSKUL NGOR, MDO 'DI LA SGOS KYI 'GREL BA MDZAD PA MA MTHONG BAS MTHA' GCIG TU DPYAD BZOD PA DKA' YANG, RJE BTZUN BLA MA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI ZHAL GYI BDUD RTZI DANG, BRJOD BYA PHYOGS MTHUN PA'I LEGS BSHAD RNAMS LA BRTEN NAS, ^ BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS RGYAL BAS LUNG BSTAN PA'I GDAN SA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RANG SPYIL DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE NAM YANG MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
